context.expression: (user.role === 'hts_provider' || user.role === 'clinician') && !contact.muted && contact.contact_type === 'clinic' && contact.record_purpose !== 'linkage' && ((summary.screenedToday && summary.hts_latest_form.form_type !== 'hts_screening_form') || (summary.screenedToday && summary.lastHtsService === 'confirmPositiveResult')) && ( !summary.has_hts_initial || (summary.hts_retest_latest.final_result && summary.hts_retest_latest.final_result != '_703_positive_99DCT') || (summary.hts_latest_form.form_type === 'hts_initial_form' && summary.hts_latest_consent.consent === '_1065_yes_99DCT'))
